explains: v. 扩散，弥漫；减弱，平息（不良情绪或局面）；传播，散布
adj. 扩散的，弥漫的；难解的，冗长的
wordGroup: diffuse reflectance 漫反射率；漫反射系数；护散反射率

sentences.en: It allows nicotine to diffuse slowly and steadily into the bloodstream.
sentences.cn: 它使尼古丁缓慢、稳步地扩散到血液当中。

sentences.en: The problem is how to diffuse power without creating anarchy.
sentences.cn: 问题在于如何将权力分散而不造成无政府状态。
